Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.value.mutable

Class MutableIndex

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.value.mutable.MutableLong
com.telenav.kivakit.core.value.mutable.MutableIndex
public class MutableIndex extends MutableLong
A thread-safe mutable index value for use in lambdas and anonymous inner classes. Can be MutableLong.increment()ed, MutableLong.decrement()ed, added to with offset(int), set with MutableLong.set(int) and retrieved with MutableLong.get().
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
